function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Relocation diffusion pattern of covid-19 in march 2020","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Global mobility and connectivity contributing to disease outbreaks","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Positive link between globalisation and covid-19 cases","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Diffusion of infectious diseases through interpersonal transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of viral transmission in the context of spatial diffusion","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Different types of spatial diffusion facilitating the spread of infectious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Globalization as a driver of covid-19 diffusion","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of social and geographic factors in covid-19 diffusion","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inherent geographical processes in the spread of infectious diseases","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Urban connectivity and covid-19 diffusion","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited containment in isolated regions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of immunity and effective vaccine for covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased anxiety and panic due to repetitive alerts","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Concerns regarding individual rights and privacy","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dependence on mass video surveillance for monitoring social distancing","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High reliance on deep learning-based solutions for monitoring social distancing","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential normalization of mass surveillance in a sustainable smart city scenario","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Using yolo for social distancing monitoring without considering its limitations and potential pitfalls","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Misinterpretation of pedestrian detections and social distancing indicators","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overreliance on single-model performance without considering the context and limitations of other detection evaluation.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of multiple detection models may lead to varied performance results and difficulty in comparing model risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"False positive predictions due to iou threshold","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"False negative predictions due to iou detection models may lead to increased interaction with potentially infected individuals during data collection.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of shared risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential violation of social distancing norms due to close proximity of pedestrians","category":"Public health
